snippet: Microsoft Corp posted a bigger-than-expected quarterly profit on Thursday, boosted by strong sales of its software and services for businesses, a solid holiday season for its new Xbox game console and Surface tablets, and a slightly lower tax bill...

headline.print_headline: Microsoft Profit Beats Forecasts, No Word on New CEO
headline.main: Microsoft Profit Beats Forecasts, No Word on New CEO

lead_paragraph: Microsoft Corp posted a bigger-than-expected quarterly profit on Thursday, boosted by strong sales of its software and services for businesses, a solid holiday season for its new Xbox game console and Surface tablets, and a slightly lower tax bill.
